byline.contributor: Gary Gately reported from Chestertown, and Richard Pérez-Peña from New York.
byline.original: By GARY GATELY and RICHARD PÉREZ-PEÑA

abstract: Washington College in Chestertown, Md, closes its campus as police search for student Jacob Marberger in Maryland and Pennsylvania; Marberger was arrested in October in firearms case in which he drunkenly brandished gun on campus.
lead_paragraph: The police issued a warrant for a Washington College student on gun charges stemming from an earlier incident on campus, as the search for him continued in Maryland and Pennsylvania.

headline.main: Maryland Campus Closed as Police Continue Search
headline.print_headline: Maryland Campus Closed as Police Continue Search

snippet: The police issued a warrant for a Washington College student on gun charges stemming from an earlier incident on campus, as the search for him continued in Maryland and Pennsylvania.
